game.name: Space Mandala
game.description: In this awesome HTML5 Game Space Mandala, you have to create mandala's in the SPACE! It is not as simple as it sounds, because you have to use the right figures to create this mandala. How far can you go in this puzzle space game?
game.metaTitle: Space Mandala, Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Space Mandala at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAP TO FIT THE IMAGES IN THE SAME SPACE, L-R ICONS TO MOVE THE CIRCLE
game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE TO FIT THE IMAGES IN THE SAME SPACE, L-R ICONS TO MOVE THE CIRCLE
